title: Would have been perfect for me if screen was 4.5-5 inches
review:
- I don't keep data on the entire day. I check my emails and social platforms a half-a-dozen times a day. Battery has been really good.
- Both cameras are awesome with good lighting conditions, but average in dimly lit condition.
- Nougat, UI and other features are beautiful and efficient.
- Says phone Manufactured in India and other accessories from Vietnam.

- Speaker is on the rear and will remain inaudible if kept normally. The sound levels are okay only.

It would have been perfect for me if the screen-size was compactly between 4.5-5 inches. Hope it stays good for at least 3 years!

title: Fabulous!
review:
Well this phone is nothing but the old J7 phone with Exynos 7870 chip set, and there is nothing to complain about. Using it for last 2 months, lag free performance, no heating issues, less battery consumption are some of key benefits I am experiencing till now! (Go for processors with semiconductor size of 14nm or less, it works!) Amoled screen with lower resolution is  helping farther to last the battery charges longer.
Build quality at best is average, and the side panels are not matt finished as it seems from the picture, they are glossy and finishing is same as the first generation J7! Those panels are plastics not metal!

title: Useless product
review: Samsung name has created so much hype that  we blindly pay more money with very less features....Battery is worst....as usual even in the costliest Samsung phone...Other companies provide finger print sensor...gorilla glass in less price....but....we still run after Samsung....The camera is not even 5 mp and its saying 13 mp...Samsung is cheating us big time...Don't know when our mentality would change...

title: Nice buy for the price. Latest phone
review:
Receved the package with in 24 hrs. Flipkart change ur name to zipkart..haha..

The phone is good, worth the price. Latest on the block from samsung. OS is Android 7.
Phone is on a bigger side with big bezels. Feels plastic in hand. Light weight.

Interface is smooth, screen clarity is gud.

Decent buy for the price.
